alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Hamilton; Marion; Meigs; Sequatchie (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 4:33AM CDT until April 01 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Bradley County in east Tennessee... Southeastern Sequatchie County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Meigs County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Marion County in east Tennessee... Central Hamilton County in east Tennessee... * Until 615 AM EDT/515 AM CDT/. * At 533 AM EDT/433 AM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fairmount, or 11 miles southeast of Dunlap, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chattanooga, Cleveland, Soddy-Daisy, Signal Mountain, Walden, Lakesite, Fairmount, Flat Top Mountain, North Chickamauga Creek Gorge and Hopewell. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 26 and 35. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM EDT/600 AM CDT/ for east Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
